overview:
Dr. Lee is results-driven professional with a track record of successful business development and management. Dr. Lee received his doctorate degree in computer science from University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign.

He currently serves as an assistant professor at Konkuk University in South Korea. During his tenure at the University, he wrote a book, “Web 3.0 is Changing the World” (Bomungak, 2010) â€“ a best-selling book in its field that explores and analyzes the current trajectory of web technology.

His interests extends, but not limited, to the area of management, marketing and the internet technology trend along with computer science, software engineering , artificial intelligence and web technology. In fact, he has been teaching classes at William F. Miller School of Technology and Management at Konkuk University such as “Internet Technology Trend” and “High-tech Marketing” along with computer science and web technology-related classes.
